topic.title: is election year
topic.body:
Now that is election year the [politics](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FBmzopHQVRmhXPMBgGbg7X1ipUhfMvBRR) are the main topic and i decided to make some boards for the different ideologies and branches.
In this elections many topics will be touch for exmaple
 
- [United States interference](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MGTCz2vDsok1PRu3uaQ7yzvoBxegi6SHA)
- [Public policy](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1B3YMUnKJevZFj9dHs2Mth71aX5GG53S2)
- [Cultural identity](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1EWrQhhwuygYWXFtxjK8f7itmwXPVeXYpr)
- etc


work in progress ........

1_17nMTJo6vFTiFupGEjkcVV5jDh9Ycx7yv7.body:
> [tkarita](#comment_153_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): Wow, that's a lot of menus.  How many sites are there?

+1 per ideology +1 branch 

i know i dint expect to be that many (politics is huge woaw) so seed what u like, is important that you only seed what u like so we can see what is more popular, people voting with their HDD
